items.title: RF-BM-2652P2
items.subtitle: Multi-Protocol Wireless Module

seo.keywords: rf-star, cc2652p, simplelink, bluetooth, zigbee, thread, ti

features.value: 0.94μA (including RTC, 80 KB RAM, and CPU retention)

items.content: RF-BM-2652P2 is a radio frequency module based on CC2652P, which is a multi-protocol wireless module supporting Thread, Zigbee®, Bluetooth® 5.1 Low Energy, IEEE 802.15.4, smart objects with IPv6 (6LoWPAN) support, proprietary systems including TI 15.4-Stack (2.4 GHz), and parallel multi-protocol through DMM driver. It combines 48MHz and 32.768 kHz crystals, 352 KB of on-chip programmable flash memory, 256 KB of ROM, 8 KB of cache SRAM, and 80 KB of ultra-low-leakage SRAM. Its main application processor, ARM® Cortex®-M4F, can operate at an extremely low current in flexible power modes. Additionally, the module enables long-range and low-power applications using the built-in powerful +20 dBm amplifier with best-in-class transmit current at 85 mA. It features small size, long-range connectivity, and high reliability.

items.title: LoLin NodeMCU ESP8266 4MB v3
items.subtitle: DevKit

seo.keywords: nodemcu, esp8266, esp-12e, devkit, arduino, wifi, iot, i2c, spi, uart, pwm, adc, espressif

items.content: LoLin NodeMCU V3 based on ESP8266 Wi-Fi / ESP-12E / CH340 is a platform used for programming and controlling various devices. ESP8266 Wi-Fi is a programmable module that allows connecting to Wi-Fi networks. NodeMCU (Lua) / Micropython (Python) / Arduino firmware files can be loaded onto this ESP8266 board, creating files in the Flash memory, and running them. The module has 11 input/output ports, some of which are multiplexed with UART, I²C, SPI, PWM, and ADC interfaces. All board pins are spaced at 2.54mm intervals. Powering the board and code uploading are done through the MicroUSB connector. The NodeMCU firmware allows putting the module into deep sleep mode to reduce power consumption and provides access to the module's extensive capabilities not available in standard firmware. The board has a voltage regulator for supplying power via USB. The ESP-12E Wi-Fi module is based on the ESP8266 core with a different Wi-Fi radio interface. The ESP8266 core is integrated into the Tensilica L106, a 32-bit microcontroller with ultra-low power consumption. Support for clock frequencies of 80 or 160MHz, support for RTOS, built-in Wi-Fi MAC/BB/RF/PA/LNA, micro-antenna on the module board. The module supports the IEEE802.11 b/g/n standard and a full stack of TCP/IP protocols.

items.title: Raspberry PI RP2040-Zero
items.subtitle: Mini
items.content:
The RP2040-Zero is a powerful development board featuring the RP2040 microcontroller. It offers a compact and versatile platform for various electronics projects. The RP2040-Zero is equipped with a dual-core ARM Cortex-M0+ processor, running at up to 133MHz, providing excellent performance and efficiency.

The RP2040 microcontroller, which is used in the RP2040-Zero board, has a total of 4 channels for DMA (Direct Memory Access). DMA allows for efficient data transfer between peripherals and memory without the need for CPU intervention. The DMA channels can be utilized to offload data transfer tasks from the CPU, freeing up processing power for other tasks. With 4 channels, the RP2040-Zero provides flexibility in managing data transfers for various peripherals and applications.

The RP2040-Zero is perfect for prototyping, IoT applications, robotics, and more. With its powerful processor, ample memory, and various built-in peripherals, it provides a solid foundation for your electronic projects.

items.title: ESP32-C3 Development Board
items.subtitle: Super mini

seo.keywords: esp32c3, mini, wifi, iot, arduino, ble, development-board, espressif

items.content: ESP32-C3 Super Mini Development Board – a powerful and compact solution for your embedded projects. Packed with the latest ESP32-C3 microcontroller, this development board offers an exceptional blend of performance, versatility, and size efficiency.
peculiarities: Powered by the cutting-edge ESP32-C3 chip, this development board ensures high-performance computing, low power consumption, and enhanced connectivity.
Designed with space efficiency in mind, the super mini form factor makes it ideal for projects where size is a crucial factor. Fit it into tight spaces without compromising on functionality.

The ESP32-C3 comes equipped with Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, opening up a world of possibilities for IoT and wireless applications. Seamlessly connect and communicate with other devices in your network.
Despite its compact size, the development board provides GPIO pins for customization, enabling you to interface with various sensors, actuators, and peripherals tailored to your project's needs.

Compatible with popular development environments like the Arduino IDE and PlatformIO, getting started with your project is a breeze. Take advantage of the vast ESP32 community and resources available for quick and efficient development.
The board includes a built-in antenna, simplifying your hardware setup and ensuring reliable wireless communication.
Benefit from the power of the ESP32-C3 microcontroller while maintaining energy efficiency – crucial for battery-powered and energy-conscious applications.

items.title: TFT35 SPI V2.1 3.5-inch 480x320
items.subtitle: For CB1 M8P 3D-printer motherboards

seo.description: Display TFT35 SPI V2.1 3.5 inch 480x320 with touch screen
seo.keywords: TFT, display, touch-screen, TFT35, SPI, 3d-printer, BIGTREETECH

items.content:
Introducing the BIGTREETECH TFT35 SPI V2.1, a versatile and crystal-clear 3D printer display meticulously crafted by the innovative 3D printing team at Shenzhen Big Tree Technology Co., Ltd.

This medium-sized display features a seamless integration of SPI for LCD display and I2C for touch functionality. The touch screen, efficiently controlled by the onboard chip, not only ensures precise responsiveness but also contributes to cost-effectiveness. The connection to the motherboard is effortlessly established through the FPC cable, offering simplicity and convenience in setup.

Crafted with the user in mind, the TFT35 SPI V2.1 comes equipped with a XH2.54 terminal, facilitating seamless communication with the printer board. Elevate your 3D printing experience with this thoughtfully designed display unit, perfectly balancing functionality and user-friendly design.
items.warningContent: TFT35 SPI can directly work with Manta M4P/M5P/M8P+CB1 v2.2 without the need for additional modules. Due to the absence of an FPC IPS interface on the PI4B Adapter, when using TFT 35 SPI with the PI4B Adapter + CB1 v2.2, it still requires an IO2CAN module for interface conversion.

items.title: USB-A to Type-C / Type-C to Type-C
items.subtitle: 60/100 W

seo.description: USB-A to Type-C / Type-C to Type-C

items.content:
The USB-A to Type-C / Type-C to Type-C 60/100W cable is a versatile and high-performance charging and data transfer solution. With its USB-A to Type-C and Type-C to Type-C connectors, it allows you to connect and charge a wide range of devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more.

This cable supports fast charging with power delivery up to 60/100W, providing efficient and quick charging for your devices. It is also capable of high-speed data transfer, allowing you to sync and transfer files between devices with ease.

The cable is built with durable materials to ensure long-lasting performance and reliability. Its compact and tangle-free design makes it convenient for travel and everyday use. Whether you need to charge your device or transfer data, the USB-A to Type-C / Type-C to Type-C 60/100W cable is a reliable and efficient choice.

Equipped with built-in protection mechanisms such as overvoltage, overcurrent, and short circuit protection, the CRS-350-24 prioritizes the safety of your connected equipment.
With a robust power delivery of 350 watts, this power supply is capable of handling demanding loads, providing ample power for a wide range of applications.
The power supply accommodates a wide input voltage range, providing flexibility in various power input scenarios.
Ideal for industrial automation, LED lighting, robotics, and various electronic projects requiring a 24V power source.

items.title: Stepper Motor NEMA 17 (40mm)
items.subtitle: 17CS04A-170E
items.content:
The 17CS04A-170E stepper motor from Cloudray is a high-performance Nema 17 stepper motor with a compact size of 40mm. It is designed to provide precise and reliable motion control in various applications, including 3D printers, CNC machines, robotics, and automation systems.

This stepper motor features a rated current of 1.7A, providing sufficient power for smooth and accurate movement. Its 2-phase design ensures excellent torque and step resolution, making it ideal for applications requiring precise positioning and control.

The 17CS04A-170E is built with high-quality materials and advanced manufacturing techniques, ensuring durability and long-lasting performance. It comes with standard 4-wire leads, making it easy to integrate into your existing setup.

Whether you are a hobbyist or a professional engineer, the Cloudray 17CS04A-170E stepper motor is a reliable and cost-effective choice for your motion control needs. Experience seamless and efficient operation with this versatile and high-performance stepper motor from Cloudray.

items.subtitle: 9999 Counts

seo.description: Digital Multimeter ANENG Q1 Red Pro

images.alt: Digital Multimeter ANENG Q1 Red Pro
Digital Multimeter ANENG Q1 Red Pro
Digital Multimeter ANENG Q1 Red Pro
Digital Multimeter ANENG Q1 Red Pro

items.content: ANENG Q1 Red Pro Digital Multimeter is equipped with True RMS (Root Mean Square) capability. True RMS is a measurement method used to accurately measure the AC voltage or current of a waveform, even if it is not a perfect sinusoidal waveform. It provides more accurate readings for AC signals with various shapes and frequencies, making it a valuable feature in electronics testing and troubleshooting.

items.title: SKR 3 EZ V1.0 32Bit Motherboard
items.subtitle: With 5x EZ5160 drivers

seo.description: Optimize your 3D printing setup with the SKR 3 EZ Motherboard. Enhance performance and ease of use

images.alt: SKR 3 EZ 32Bit - Top view with EZ5160 drivers
SKR 3 EZ 32Bit - Side view with EZ5160 drivers

items.content:
The SKR 3 EZ V1.0 motherboard represents a significant upgrade to the 32-bit 3D printer motherboard line. This motherboard enhances compatibility with our EZ series drivers, while also supporting TMC drivers. With its advanced features and seamless integration, it's designed to elevate your 3D printing experience to new heights.

Differences between SKR 3 and SKR 3 EZ Motherboards

1. Product Size:
  • SKR 3: Product size measures 110*85mm, with an installation size of 102*76mm.
  • SKR 3 EZ: Product size is slightly different at 109.7*98mm, while the installation size remains the same at 102*76mm.
2. Motor Voltage:
  • SKR 3: Supports motor voltage ranging from DC 12V to 24V.
  • SKR 3 EZ: Offers a wider range, from 12V to 48V, adjustable via a jumper cap. Higher voltage options significantly enhance printing speed. Additionally, while SKR 3 features 2 normal fans, the EZ version boasts 3, ensuring smoother printer operation and superior print quality.
3. Connection Methods:
  • SKR 3: Utilizes the driver connector for compatibility with our newly designed EZ driver.
  • SKR 3 EZ: Streamlines the process by allowing direct insertion of the EZ driver, eliminating the need for a converter. The EZ driver's design prioritizes user safety, featuring finger-friendly components to mitigate the risk of injury from sharp pin headers. Furthermore, the innovative anti-plug linker design enhances mainboard protection, addressing previous issues of driver and mainboard damage due to incorrect insertion. This upgraded driver technology ensures a safe and enjoyable user experience.
peculiarities: Fan Interfaces: 3 CNC fans, 3 normally open fans.
Expansion Interfaces: BLTouch (Servos, Probe), PS-ON, PWR-DET, Fil-DET, RGB, CAN FD.
Heating Interfaces: Bed (HB), Hot End (E0, E1).

Equipped with the TPS5450-5A power chip, this motherboard seamlessly supports DC12/24V power input, boasting an impressive output current of up to 5A, with a peak value reaching 6A. This robust power provision perfectly complements Raspberry Pi setups.
Featuring a reserved BOOT button, users can effortlessly update the motherboard boot program through DFU.
Enhanced protection circuitry for the thermistor section mitigates risks of main control chip damage due to heated bed or heating rod leakage.

Offering versatile voltage selection (24V, 12V, 5V) for the numerical control fan through an external power supply module, eliminating the need for customer's external transformer modules and reducing the risk of motherboard damage.
The thermistor's pull-up resistance value can be conveniently selected through a jumper, enabling support for PT1000 without external modules, enhancing DIY flexibility.
Comprehensive support for all versions of serial, SPI, and LCD screens.
Simplified firmware upgrades through an SD card, ensuring a user-friendly and efficient operation.
Convenient utilization of on-board DIAG function pins via simple jumper cap insertion and removal.
Supports an array of functions including resume printing, Filament Run-out Detection, Completed Shutdown, BLTouch, RGB Lights, and more.
Incorporating high-performance MOSFETs to minimize heat generation.
Featuring a replaceable fuse for easy maintenance and replacement.
Integration of a WIFI module (ESP-12S, ESP-07, ESP32) for enhanced connectivity options.
On-board non-self-elastic MicroSD card slot operating in SDIO mode for improved transfer rates.
Onboard EEPROM for hassle-free parameter information storage.
Dual CAN interfaces (USB port and XH2.54 6Pin terminal interface) with a double-pole double-throw switch, offering versatility for accessory usage.
Temperature sensor interface with high-precision pull-up resistor.
Compatible drive sockets for both EZ series drive modules and TMC series drive modules.
Each motor drive module can conveniently select the corresponding motor voltage through a jumper cap.
Supports motor power supply up to 48V, with isolation chip integration for enhanced safety, especially with TMC5160 and EZ5160 usage.
